definition: to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: How could we establish multi-lingual communication models in different contexts?
sentences.chinese: 如何建立不同情境下多语言沟通模式？

sentences.english: Strategic communication plays an important role in the implementation of its corporate strategy.
sentences.chinese: 战略沟通在提升企业战略执行力中具有重要作用。

sentences.english: A common vocabulary or common understanding can help all in communications.
sentences.chinese: 一套公共词汇或共识可以全方位帮助沟通。

sentences.english: It was the first-ever direct communication from Bush to Kim.
sentences.chinese: 这是布什和金正日之间的第一次直接沟通。

sentences.english: Social competency has a big impact on communication and is essential for post-school outcomes.
sentences.chinese: 社交技巧对沟通有很大的影响，是毕业后的重要表现。

sentences.english: AWE's data-based applications are the next generation of wireless communication and services.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏的数据库申请是无线沟通的下代和服务。

sentences.english: Next step, figure out how to capture and communicate those changes.
sentences.chinese: 下一步，估计如何捕捉和沟通这些变化。

sentences.english: By definition, a conversation is bi-directional communication.
sentences.chinese: 顾名思义，“对话”就是一个双向的沟通过程。

sentences.english: Develop students' professional knowledge and the ability of self-expression, communication, and collaboration in teamwork.
sentences.chinese: 著重团队合作学习，提升表达及沟通能力。

sentences.english: ConclusionsImproving communication methods can decrease the depressive level of the patients with stroke dysphasia.
sentences.chinese: 结论改善沟通可以降低脑卒中语言障碍患者抑郁程度。

sentences.english: Xobni will face competition in its quest to improve online communications.
sentences.chinese: Xobni在改善在线沟通方面将面对竞争。

sentences.english: Later, when metaphysics and buddhism arose in Wei Jin period, the shape and bearing of an object.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋时期玄佛兴起，理沟通了形与神。

sentences.english: By Roderick Suganob As the medium of communication evolves, so is the marketing world.
sentences.chinese: “商业登记作为沟通媒介”的发展，因此是营销世界。

sentences.english: My disposition is more inflexible, not to be pooh-poohed communicates contact with at following a person.
sentences.chinese: 我的性格比较僵硬，不善于跟人沟通打交道。

sentences.english: Consider enrolling in a couples communication class.
sentences.chinese: 可以考虑参加一些夫妻沟通课程。

definition: variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
conflict/to conflict/clash of opposing forces/collision (of interests)/contention
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
